alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:27PM EDT until June 26 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Davidson County in central North Carolina... Western Randolph County in central North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lexington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 710 PM, 2.5 in hail was reported in downtown Lexington. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... High Point, Asheboro, Lexington, Randleman, Thomasville, Denton, Gordontown, Martha and High Rock Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
